exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.notes: 250 added to press for 15 reps in week 12
form_cues: First set often feels heavy so do proper pyramid warmup. Any knee wobbling is not good, i think that means the quad is strong but the knee is not, for now hold on to them for safety but work on knee stability very lightly, dont stress them too much

exercises.name: Seated Leg Curl
exercises.notes: 43 for 13 plus reps for 4 sets in week 12
form_cues: Because we learnt that first sets are most important we should try to get a proper rpe 8-9 on first set and with every other set reps can decrease and rpe increase because of strict rest time period and that’s okay!

exercises.name: Leg Extension
form_cues: 2-3 seconds negative to feel quads tear apart.

exercises.name: Cable Hip Adduction
exercises.notes: 13.6 for 13 to 17 reps for 3 sets in week 12, adjust goal accordingly
form_cues: Brace your standing leg’s hip like in shoulder press to really lock in adductors.
Height set to 6, see Jeff’s form(controlled release hard pull).
Rotate pulling leg slightly inward and i felt more adductors.
Take more rest between legs, use a stand to rest pulling leg on when unclipping.
I start to feel lower back and rest of glutes in it so be careful when loading.

exercises.name: Cable Hip Abduction
exercises.notes: adjust goal as you progress with the current phase
form_cues: Think about kicking up, then you’d keep the hip stable.
Perfect form with controlled negative and explosive push.

exercises.name: Standing Calf Raise
exercises.notes: adjust goal by testing as you progress into week 5
form_cues: I can keep more surface of my feet on the stepper, being more on toes pushed my knee to the limit.
